Class Pen

java.lang.Object
  Pen

public class Pen
extends java.lang.Object

Class to represent a pen which has a color, width, and a list of path segments that it should draw. A pen also knows if it is up or down
Copyright Georgia Institute of Technology 2004

Author:
Barb Ericson ericson@cc.gatech.edu
